step1.title: Choose a Product
step1.desc: Browse the catalog and select your favorite trees

step2.title: Leave a Request
step2.desc: Fill out the form with contact information

step3.title: Receive Delivery
step3.desc: Manager will clarify details and deliver the order

q1.question: How fast do you deliver?
q1.answer: We deliver within 24 hours in Tashkent. For regions, delivery takes 2-3 days.

q2.question: What warranty on plants?
q2.answer: We provide a 30-day warranty on all live plants when following care recommendations.

q3.question: Can I return a product?
q3.answer: Yes, you can return the product within 14 days if it has not been used and the appearance is preserved.

q4.question: Do you have artificial trees?
q4.answer: Yes, our catalog includes both live and premium quality artificial decorative trees.
